name: 2D Shooter (minchuky)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project

Modifications:

1. Design Modification in the form of adding multiple additional levels and creating a logical progression of the game

2. Aesthetic Modification in the form of redesigning the player or an enemy to a completely different character

3. Gameplay Modification in the form of adding new player abilities, such as modified ship controls or a power up

Credits:

Created by Yauheniya Minchuk
